verses.verse: When Israel<WH3478> was a child<WH5288>, then I loved<WH157> him<WH7121>, and called my son<WH1121> out of Egypt<WH4714>.
The more the prophets called<WH7121> them<WH1980>, the more they went from them<WH6440>: they sacrificed<WH2076> unto the Baalim<WH1168>, and burned incense<WH6999> to graven images<WH6456>.
Yet I taught<WH8637> Ephraim<WH669> to walk<WH8637>; I took<WH3947> them on my arms<WH2220>; but they knew<WH3045> not that I healed them<WH7495>.

I drew<WH4900> them with cords<WH2256> of a man<WH120>, with bands<WH5688> of love<WH160>; and I was to them as they that lift up<WH7311> the yoke<WH5923> on their jaws<WH3895>; and I laid<WH5186> food before them<WH398>.
They shall not return<WH7725> into the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>; but the Assyrian<WH804> shall be their king<WH4428>, because they refused<WH3985> to return to me<WH7725>.
And the sword<WH2719> shall fall<WH2342> upon their cities<WH5892>, and shall consume<WH3615> their bars<WH905>, and devour<WH398> them<WH4156>, because of their own counsels.
And my people<WH5971> are bent<WH8511> on backsliding<WH4878> from me<WH7121>: though they call them to him that is on high<WH5920>, none at all<WH3162> will exalt him<WH7311>.

How shall I give thee up<WH5414>, Ephraim<WH669>? how shall I cast<WH4042> thee off<WH3478>, Israel? how shall I make<WH5414> thee as Admah<WH126>? how shall I set<WH7760> thee as Zeboiim<WH6636>? my heart<WH3820> is turned<WH2015> within me<WH5150>, my compassions are kindled<WH3648> together<WH3162>.

I will not execute<WH6213> the fierceness<WH2740> of mine anger<WH639>, I will not return<WH7725> to destroy<WH7843> Ephraim<WH669>: for I am God<WH410>, and not man<WH376>; the Holy One<WH6918> in the midst<WH7130> of thee<WH935>; and I will not come in wrath<WH5892>.
They shall walk<WH3212> after<WH310> Jehovah<WH3068>, who will roar<WH7580> like a lion<WH738>; for he will roar<WH7580>, and the children<WH1121> shall come trembling<WH2729> from the west<WH3220>.

They shall come trembling<WH2729> as a bird<WH6833> out of Egypt<WH4714>, and as a dove<WH3123> out of the land<WH776> of Assyria<WH804>; and I will make<WH3427> them to dwell in their houses<WH1004>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

Ephraim <WH669> compasseth<WH5437> me about with falsehood<WH3585>, and the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> with deceit<WH4820>; but Judah<WH3063> yet ruleth<WH7300> with God<WH410>, and is faithful<WH539> with the Holy One<WH6918>.
